website_summaries.verdict: Weighing a whopping 8 lbs. each, these thick, heavy-duty cotton/poly blankets are super-durable and help protect your belongings from dings, scratches and scuffs throughout your move.
pros: Buying flexibility: can buy blankets individually, or in packs of 4, 12, or 24
cons: Stitching unravels easily on some blankets
Some folks report a chemical smell

customer_reviews.title: Best blankets I could find
customer_reviews.text: These blankets are sturdy, thick and feel like they will work for a long time. We got 3 different kinds and these were the most expensive, but if I could redo it, I would have only gotten these. Some of the other blankets I doubled up with a thin felt layer. I did not have to do that with these. A+ quality. PS no smell either.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Best ones yet
customer_reviews.text: I've used moving blanket on the floor of my vehicles for 20 years because my dog (malamute) rides with me and it protects the carpet for wear and hair. These are by far the best ones I've used, they show almost no wear from his claws and they can be washed without threads coming out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Exactly as advertised. Nice, heavy, clean. Using in home theater behind dark sheer drapes. Blankets spaced off of wall 2.5". As expected, not much low frequency absorption (spacing helps), but really cleans up the vocal range mud. Overdampens the highs, but after room eq, I have a decent 'dead' surround screening room. Very happy with the value.
customer_reviews.author: Sean 'Hodgepodgekiss'

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight moving blankets!
customer_reviews.text: Please blankets were incredibly thick and durable. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Thick but not to thick
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, thick enough to protect the furniture but not so thick that you can't pack the truck easily. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: luvflicks

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Using these blankets for sound proofing a garage. Not perfect but there is a noticeable difference, and it’s good bang for your buck if you’re trying to diy it and not spend lots on professional soundproofing
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: These are fairly heavy and seem good quality. Black on the outside
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly heavy and seem good quality. Black on the outside, white on the inside. The stack of 12 folded to 3'x2' stands about 32 inches tall. When carrying it I need to take the stack in three trips.
customer_reviews.author: A H

customer_reviews.title: Thick and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Blankets were delivered quickly and packaged well. Heavy duty. Seem well-made and as-advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom/Attorney

customer_reviews.title: I opted to go for the more expensive brand and couldn't be happier! I will have these moving blankets for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely high quality product! After extensive research, I opted to go for the more expensive brand and couldn't be happier! I will have these moving blankets for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J Huene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I got just what I ordered and expected! Professional moving blankets!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sigourney

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I feel safe using these to store my natural wood furniture. They are good quality and seem like they will hold up well. One downside is we had to air them out when they came as there was a bit of an odor. So make sure you get them a few days before you need them.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie and Evan

product_meta.title: US Cargo Control Supreme Mover Moving Blankets | 72 inch x 80 inch Heavy Duty Black and White Moving Pads| 7.5 pounds each (90 pounds per dozen) | 12 Blankets
product_meta.description: Pattern Name:12These very durable moving blankets weigh approximately 7.5 pounds each and are constructed with a premium cotton/poly blend for maximum protection and durability. The cotton fiber blend provides a softer touch, and its thickness provides superior padding. The recycled cotton filling between two quilted layers protects your cargo from shocks and bumps during transit, and the black quilted overlay with zigzag stitching gives the moving pads a sleek finish. These heavy-duty moving blankets can be reused many times and will not tear from regular use. Ideal for individuals and professional movers alike, these moving blankets are great as furniture pads or to cover and protect large cargo. A moving pad is a great way to protect items from breaking, scuffing or scratching through any move or while in storage. The woven binding allows these blankets to be washed if they become soiled. Line dry only. Note: Blankets may have a slight odor when first using.
feature_bullets: Quilted premium cotton/polyester blend is extremely durable, and can be machine washed. Hang to dry.
The ultimate moving pad for long distance moves, valuable items, and professional movers. Also a great choice to protect items in storage.
The Supreme Mover moving pads are not intended for soundproofing, and do not include grommets for hanging
The 3 inch black woven binding will not come unraveled when the moving blanket is washed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars222 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
